trans-unit.source: Represents a Range header value.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Range 標頭值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue> class provides support for the Range header as defined in [RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=241642) by the IETF.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue>類別會提供支援的範圍標頭中所定義[RFC 2616](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=241642) IETF 根據。

trans-unit.source: Since all HTTP entities are represented in HTTP messages as sequences of bytes, the concept of a byte range is meaningful for any HTTP entity.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有的 HTTP 實體會表示為位元組序列的 HTTP 訊息，位元組範圍的概念是對任何 HTTP 實體有意義的。

trans-unit.source: However, not all clients and servers need to support byte-range operations.
trans-unit.target: 不過，並非所有的用戶端和伺服器需要支援位元組範圍作業。

trans-unit.source: The Range header on a request allows a client to request that it only wants to receive some part of the specified range of bytes in an HTTP entity.
trans-unit.target: 要求的範圍標頭可讓用戶端要求，它只想要在 HTTP 實體中接收指定的位元組範圍的某些部分。

trans-unit.source: Servers are not required to support Range header requests.
trans-unit.target: 伺服器不需要支援範圍標頭的要求。

trans-unit.source: An example of a Range header in an HTTP protocol request that requests the first 100 bytes would be would be the following:
trans-unit.target: 在 HTTP 通訊協定的要求會要求前 100 個位元組的範圍標頭的範例應如下所示：

trans-unit.source: A HTTP server indicates support for Range headers with the Accept-Ranges header.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 伺服器指出範圍標頭，以接受範圍標頭的支援。

trans-unit.source: An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that supports byte-ranges would be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 從支援位元組範圍的伺服器接受範圍標頭的範例應如下所示：

trans-unit.source: If an Accept-Ranges header is not received in the header of the response from the server, then the server does not support Range headers.
trans-unit.target: 如果接受範圍標頭未收到來自伺服器的回應標頭中，伺服器不支援範圍標頭。

trans-unit.source: An example of the Accept-Ranges header from a server that does not support ranges, but recognizes the Accept-Ranges header, would be as follows:
trans-unit.target: 將伺服器不支援的範圍，但可辨識的接受範圍標頭的接受範圍標頭的範例應如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to start sending data.
trans-unit.target: 要開始傳送資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: The position at which to stop sending data.
trans-unit.target: 要停止傳送資料的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> class with a byte range.
trans-unit.target: 使用位元組範圍初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue> class with a Range header containing a specified byte range.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue>類別範圍標頭包含指定的位元組範圍。

trans-unit.source: An example of a Range header with a byte range in an HTTP protocol request that requests the first 100 bytes would be would be the following:
trans-unit.target: HTTP 通訊協定的要求會要求前 100 個位元組的位元組範圍的範圍標頭的範例應如下所示：

trans-unit.source: For this example, the `from` parameter would be specified as 0 and the `to` parameter would be specified as 99.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`from`參數會指定為 0 和`to`參數會指定為 99。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="from" /> is greater than <paramref name="to" />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="from" /> 大於 <paramref name="to" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="from" /> or <paramref name="to" /> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="from" /> 或 <paramref name="to" /> 小於 0。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否等於目前的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 和目前的物件相等，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 做為 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件的雜湊函式。

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A hash code is a numeric value that is used to identify an object during equality testing.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊程式碼是用來識別物件在等號比較測試期間的數值。

trans-unit.source: It can also serve as an index for an object in a collection.
trans-unit.target: 它也可做為集合中物件的索引。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue.GetHashCode%2A> method is suitable for use in hashing algorithms and data structures such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue.GetHashCode%2A>方法適合用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊表。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents range header value information.
trans-unit.target: 代表 range 標頭值資訊的字串。

trans-unit.source: Converts a string to an <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 將字串轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is a <see langword="null" /> reference.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 是 <see langword="null" /> 參考。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is not valid range header value information.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 不是有效的 range 標頭值資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ranges specified from the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件取得指定的範圍。

trans-unit.source: The ranges from the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件中的範圍。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 建立新物件，為目前 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行個體的複本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回表示目前 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: he string to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> version of the string.
trans-unit.target: 字串的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 版本。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a string is valid <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> information.
trans-unit.target: 判斷字串是否為有效的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="input" /> is valid <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue" /> information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="input" /> 是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.AuthenticationHeaderValue" /> 資訊，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit from the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件取得單元。

trans-unit.source: The unit from the <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Http.Headers.RangeHeaderValue" /> 物件的單元。
